title: Smoky Mountain National Park
description: In October 2018 my wife and I went to the Smoky Mountains.

photos.description: Some tree roots. I like the kind of shiny/slimy-looking texture.
A spider that my camera struggled to find enough light to capture.
A bunch of fog, hence the "smoky" part.
Many trees on some mountains and more fog.
Water droplets dripping from above part-way up Mount LeConte. Lens flare too for extra style.
A view from the top of Mount LeConte. I'm not sure what those flowers (?) are in the foreground, but I like the texture they add.
